t: Amazon.com : Fruit of the Earth Aloe Vera 100% Gel 6 oz (Pack of 2) : After Sun Skin Care Moisturizers : Beauty & Personal Care
s: I’ve tried several aloe vera gels, and Fruit of the Earth Aloe Vera Gel is by far the best! It’s thick, absorbs quickly, and really soothes sunburns, dry skin, and irritations like insect bites. Unlike watery brands, this one works with just a small amount and leaves no greasy residue.
